company.name: Indigenous Services Canada | Services aux Autochtones Canada

profile_positions.company: Indigenous Services Canada | Services aux Autochtones Canada
profile_positions.description:
• Review technical documents (feasibility study reports, pre-design reports, 99% design drawings, and Project Approval Requests (PAR)) of engineering projects related to water and wastewater treatment plants for Indigenous Communities.
• Track the state of the Long-Term Drinking Water Advisories and Short-Term Drinking Water Advisories throughout Canada, ensuring measures are taken to solve the problems promptly.
• Brief Senior Management on project revisions, key elements for consideration, red flags, recommendations, and conclusions.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer (ENG-03) – Strategic Water Management Team

profile_positions.company: Indigenous Services Canada | Services aux Autochtones Canada
profile_positions.description:
• Reviewed technical documents of infrastructure projects (i.e., energy systems, roads & bridges, structural mitigation, etc.).
• Developed feasibility study guidance documents to support Indigenous communities, and Regional Offices across the country, in tender processes.
• Collaborated with internal and external stakeholders to inform policy advice and advance in closing the infrastructure gap in Indigenous communities.
profile_positions.title: Engineer (ENG-02) – Sustainable Operations Directorate

profile_positions.description:
• Performed activities related to sampling and inspection of water quality at storm sewer outfalls, sewer discharge locations and surface waters within the City of Toronto.
• Sampled preparation (i.e., coolers, fill out chain of custodies and sample bottles) for the Beaches Monitoring Program and Outfall Monitoring Program.
• Answered inquiries, provide general information at various media events related to beaches and water quality sampling.
profile_positions.title: Technical Trainee – Toronto Water

profile_positions.description: •	Assessed shorelines properties across eastern Ontario and provided voluntary stewardship recommendations to protect lake health.
profile_positions.title: Intern – Love your Lake program

profile_positions.description:
•	Supervised different production centers to ensure water quality and availability in Colombia’s largest beverage company 
•	Implemented projects aimed to improve water efficient use and a lower treatment cost, based on two KPI’s: Water consumption / Beverage produced and cost of water treatment per m3
•	Trained more than 100 supervisors and technical operators in Good Manufacturing Practices in Water Treatment
profile_positions.title: Quality Engineer - Water treatment

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the $2.09 M water purification plant project in the company's new packaging line with a Capacity install of 100 m3/h
•	Participated in bidding process, supervision of project execution and responsible for communication bridge between different project stakeholders
•	Developed projects related with environmental legislation, wastewater treatment and analysis of new water sources. 
•	Participated in primary project of water risk matrix design.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Trainee – Project  & Environmental Engineer
